titleStmt.title: A lamentation taken up for the churchs [sic] of the Anabaptists by John Collens ; with a call, and warning for them to come out of the self separation, into the footsteps of the flock, and to turn from the darkness to the true light.
titleStmt.author: Collens, John, d. 1682.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication conjectured by cataloger from internal evidence.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
